description:
Ketto is a young boy who gets a birthday present from his aunt http://anidb.net/ch40152 [Maki], a black cat doll which is delivered by http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki].
As Kiki loses the cat doll before delivering it, http://anidb.net/ch13883 [Jiji] has to play the replacement for it until Kiki has found the real doll and returns to exchange them, with the support by Ketto`s dog Jeff.
name: Ketto
